pb001CommentsClaimLevelRow.cDescription: ALL DENIALS ON THIS SETTLEMENT WITH AN INDICATOR OF "@" ARE BASED ON BCBSRI'S MEDICAL NECESSITY CRITERIA. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH THIS DENIAL, PLEASE WRITE TO 500 EXCHANGE ST., PROVIDENCE, RI 02903, ATTN: GRIEVANCE APPEALS UNIT. YOU MAY ALSO CALL OR WRITE TO THE PHYSICIAN AND PROVIDER SERVICE CENTER AT (401) 274-4848 OR 1-800-230-9050, OR THE FACILITY CENTER AT (401) 274-3103 OR 1-800-637-3718 EXT 6067 TO INITIATE AN APPEAL OR ASK A QUESTION ABOUT YOUR CLAIM.
AS OF OCTOBER 1, 2015, ALL PROVIDERS, HOSPITALS, AND FACILITIES MUST BE TRANSITIONED TO ICD-10. VISIT THE ICD-10 PAGE ON BCBSRI.COM FOR INFORMATION, TOOLS, AND RESOURCES.
